description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Gateways is a world-twisting 2D platform game.  Acquire the powerful gateways gauntlet and its power-ups to place gateways allowing you to travel instantly from one place to another, change size, rotate the world and even travel in time.
description.short: Gateways is a world-twisting 2D platform game.  Acquire the powerful gateways gauntlet and its power-ups to place gateways allowing you to travel instantly from one place to another, change size, rotate the world and even travel in time.
